MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_FNS
MODULE.description:
FNS algorithm in the voice postprocessor on the Rx path.
This module#[ #] supports the following parameter IDs 
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_FNS
VOICE_PARAM_FNS_V2

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FNS
PARAMETER.description:
FNS algorithm.
Fixed size for this parameter 
Version 0 - 76 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode for#[ #] enabling/disabling submodules

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsInputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain to#[ #] FENS module

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsTargetNS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Target noise#[ #] suppression level in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNSNRmax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upper bound in#[ #] dB for SNR estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSNblock
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Quarter block size#[ #] for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNi
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initialization block#[ #] size for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNPscale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Power scale#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing factor#[ #] for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambdaf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for higher level nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsBias
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bias factor in dB#[ #] for gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SNR lower bound in#[ #] dB for aggressive gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction factor for high-band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMaxHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for high-band nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] high-band excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update during speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsFast
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Fast smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMed
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Medium smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsSlow
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Slow smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSwbNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for super wide band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for#[ #] generating a binary VAD decision

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pwrScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indirectly#[ #] lower-bounds the noise level estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hangoverMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Avoids mid-speech#[ #] clipping and reliably detects weak speech bursts at the end of speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alphaSNR
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls#[ #] responsiveness of the VAD

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initLength
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the number#[ #] of frames for which noise level estimate is set to a fixed value

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: maxVal
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the upper#[ #] limit of the noise level

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the initial#[ #] bounding value for the noise level estimate; used during the initial segment defined by the parameter initLength

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: resetBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Reset bound for#[ #] noise tracking

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: avarScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the bias#[ #] factor in noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sub_Nc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the window#[ #] length for noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spowMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the minimum#[ #] signal power required to update the bounds for the noise floor estimate

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FNS_V2
PARAMETER.description:
FNS version 2 algorithm. This parameter defines the structure for the#[ #] Comfort Noise Injection module. 
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 -- 84 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies version.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field as zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode for#[ #] enabling/disabling submodules

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsInputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input gain to#[ #] FENS module

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsOutputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsTargetNS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Target noise#[ #] suppression level in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNSNRmax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upper bound in#[ #] dB for SNR estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSNblock
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Quarter block size#[ #] for stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNi
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initialization block#[ #] size for nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNPscale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Power scale#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing factor#[ #] for nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambdaf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for higher level nonstationary noise update

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsBias
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bias factor in dB#[ #] for gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SNR lower bound in#[ #] dB for aggressive gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction factor for high-band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNalphaMaxHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] over-subtraction factor for high-band nonstationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsEalphaHB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor for#[ #] high-band excess noise suppression

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsNLambda0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] factor for nonstationary noise update during speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsFast
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Fast smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsMed
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Medium smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsGsSlow
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Slow smoothing#[ #] factor for postprocessor gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSwbNalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over-subtraction#[ #] factor for super wide band stationary NS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSwbSalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To do

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for#[ #] generating a binary VAD decision

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pwrScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indirectly#[ #] lower-bounds the noise level estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hangoverMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Avoids mid-speech#[ #] clipping and reliably detects weak speech bursts at the end of speech activity

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alphaSNR
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls#[ #] responsiveness of the VAD

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: snrDiffMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this#[ #] parameter value may help in making correct decisions during abrupt changes; however, decreasing too much may increase false alarms during long#[ #] pauses/silences

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initLength
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the number#[ #] of frames for which noise level estimate is set to a fixed value

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: maxVal
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the upper#[ #] limit of the noise level

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the initial#[ #] bounding value for the noise level estimate; used during the initial segment defined by the parameter initLength

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: resetBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Reset bound for#[ #] noise tracking

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: avarScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the bias#[ #] factor in noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sub_Nc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the window#[ #] length for noise estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spowMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Defines the minimum#[ #] signal power required to update the bounds for the noise floor estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsTargetNoiseFloor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Comfort#[ #] noise leve

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fnsSlopeNoiseFloor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Comfort#[ #] noise slope to determine the shape of the comfort noise.

MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_FNS_V2
MODULE.description:
FNS version 2 algorithm in the voice postprocessor on the Rx path.#[ #] Version 2 provides better noise suppression.
This module supports the following parameter IDs:
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_FNS_V3

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FNS_V3
PARAMETER.description:
FNS version 3 algorithm. This parameter defines the structure for#[ #] VOICE_MODULE_FNS_V2. FNS v3 provides better noise suppression than previous FNS modules.
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 – 124#[ #] bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_feature_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Controls overall functionality mode bit

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_GT_delayMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: FFT type (low#[ #] delay, high delay)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_GT_resolutionMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Compressed Subband resolution mode bit flag (low, high and super)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_GT_InputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input#[ #] gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_GT_OutputGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output#[ #] gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vad_Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: VAD type mode#[ #] bit

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vadnref_Ni
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0 Block#[ #] length for initial non-stationary NS estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vadnref_NPscale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q7.8#[ #] Speech level scale factor for non-stationary noise computation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vadnref_NLambda
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q15#[ #] Smoothing factor for non-stationary noise averaging

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vadnref_NLambdaf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q15#[ #] Higher smoothing factor for non-stationary noise averaging

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_vadnref_NLambda0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q15#[ #] Highest smoothing factor for non-stationary noise averaging

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] threshold for VAD detection

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_pwrScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] Multiplication factor for speech power

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_hangoverMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length#[ #] of hangover window

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_alphaSNR
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] averaging factor for smoothing SNR estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_snrDiffMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q7.8#[ #] max limit for log SNR difference

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_snrDiffMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q7.8#[ #] min limit for log SNR difference

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_initLength
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number#[ #] of initial frames for min bound control

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_maxVal
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] square-root of upper bound for noise power estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_initBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] square-root of initial value for minimum bound

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_resetBound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15 square-root of reset value for minimum bound

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_avarScale
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q2.13#[ #] Multiplication factor for speech standard deviation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_sub_Nc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sub-window#[ #] length for single-mic VAD

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_avad_spowMin
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q0.15#[ #] square root of minimum speech power threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] sub-module mode bit

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_wlenInit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] init windows length

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_wlenInc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] window size increase counter step size

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_wlenMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] window max size

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_band1I
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] band1 index

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_band2I
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] band2 index

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_alphaP
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] probability smoothing alpha

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_alphaD
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] noise estimate learning rate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_overest_factL16Q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT noise reference over-estimate factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_nlinitQL16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT#[ #] initial noise floor Q factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP_Mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP sub-module#[ #] mode bit

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP1_alphaL16Q13
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP1#[ #] over-subtraction factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP1_alpha_smLB_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP1 time averaging smoothing rate for low band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP1_alpha_smNLB_L16Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP1 time averaging smoothing rate for high band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP1_minGainL16_Q14
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP1 minimum gain floor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP1_envRestFactL16Q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP1 envelope restoration factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_TargetNS
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2#[ #] Target Noise suppression level in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_Nalpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2#[ #] Over-subtraction factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_NalphaMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2#[ #] Max Over-subtraction factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_NSNRmax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2#[ #] Upper bound in dB for SNR estimation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_GsBias
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2 Bias#[ #] factor in dB for gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_GsMax
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2 SNR#[ #] Lower bound in dB for aggressive gain calculation

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_submode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2 sub#[ #] module functionality mode bit control flag

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_envRest_FactL16Q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: PP2 envelope restoration factor

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_TargetNoiseFloor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Comfort noise level

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_PP2_SlopeNoiseFloor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Comfort noise slope to determine the shape of the comfort noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set#[ #] this value to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_thrB1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT band1 noise update threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_thrB2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT band2 noise update threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_thrB3
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT band3 noise update threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fns_v2_smrmt_nlinitL32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: SMRMT band3 noise update threshold
